item.title: Investment Portfolio Optimization with Quantum Computing
item.description: This page has been written for Womanium Quantum Hackathon 2022. The project is intended to exploit quantum computing for the problem of portfolio investment optimization, according to Hackathon Challenges number 13, Womanium Open Quantum & Entrepreneurship Challenge –> by Womanium This is a deadly serious project aiming for real world startup project within 6-12 months in Thailand and Southeast Asia. Objective: To strike a prototype of quantum computing circuit designed to generate investment portfolio optimization.
